title: LOCATION! 1/1 Walnut Creek CONDO Close to Everything!
posting_body: ['Location Location Location!!', 'Live in the heart of Downtown Walnut Creek in a private secured building.', 'First time offered for lease!', "Escape to your own private sanctuary in one of the most Exclusive Condo Complex's in Walnut Creek - Greenwood Condominiums.", 'Well maintained complex covered with tropical palm trees hidden right behind Broadway Plaza/Downtown Walnut Creek.', 'Exclusive 1 bed 1 bath Condo on the 2nd floor, 700 sqf. of living space.', 'Updated flooring, fresh paint, and new appliances.', 'Oversized patio for relaxing, and large eat-in kitchen!', 'Secured building comes with its own security access code at the entrance...', 'The laundry facility is conveniently located on the same floor as the unit.', 'There is a large clubhouse downstairs with separate lounge area for entertaining guests if you wish, large community pool with a gym, and billiard tables!', 'One dedicated covered carport per unit, with uncovered parking spaces available with a permit in front...', 'Guest parking available on the street.', 'Walking distance to Broadway Plaza.', 'Close to Freeway 680/24, Walnut Creek and Pleasant Hill BART, and 1 block away from Nordstrom and Safeway.', 'Shopping, dinning, parks, theaters, and so much more!', 'Offered furnished or unfurnished, its your choice.', '$2900 Furnished', '$2780 Unfurnished', "Deposit is one month's rent.", 'Small dog or cat ok with a $500 deposit.', 'Contact Flora at', 'show contact info', '.', 'Seriously inquiries ONLY.', 'Interested renters are advised to thoroughly investigate all aspects of the information herein to determine if the property satisfies the requirements of the renter for the renters intended use of the property.', 'Equal housing opportunity.']
